name: 1 Shot 1 Kill
description:
Download for best Quality!!!

****************************************************************************

One on One duel, like the old days. No aim assist, no reloads. One Bullet, One Shot, One Enemy, One Life. Risk it all on one shot against the best. With your honor on the line,  will you prevail? 

Made for the third annual Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam.  The theme is "Only One", and I decided to use that to make a Dueling Game. Gun Duels in the old days were often fought on as fair as grounds as possible. This meant that only one bullet was usually used and only one shot was fired per person. I decided to capture this in a game featuring dueling Robots, because obviously.

I hope you enjoy this game as much as I enjoyed making it. It is heavily influenced by Western film. It is especially inspired by the duel in "The Good, the Bad and the Ugly" by Sergio Leone. The music, which was also inspired by westerns, was composed from scratch by Austin Slade Jones, who managed to turn this around in a night! 

*********************************************************************************

Browser playable version added after the fact due to convenience for reviewers, no changes have been made. please download for  on-time entry and full experience.
